City Services

The City of Springtown is a full-service city providing police, Municipal Court, water, and sewer service, trash pick-up, animal control and building inspections.

Hours of Operation:
7:30 a.m. to 4:30 pm Monday through Friday

Address:
102 East Second Street
Springtown, Texas 76082
